name: Cash Dash
description:
Cash Dash is a 2.5D fun platformer game where the player has to run, jump, slide, and crouch through various platforms in record time while attempting to collect as much money as possible. In addition, the game has moving platforms, spikes, speed runs, checkpoints and jump boost pads to help or slow down the player while trying to complete the level. At the end of each level, the player gets a completion rate which depends on the time taken to complete the level and the money collected. The game has 10 themed levels with varying levels of difficulty.

All the levels were created by the crew members at nonPareil. nonPareil Institute's mission is to help adults on the autism spectrum grow towards their potential by providing work readiness training integrated with hands-on technical instruction and social engagement opportunities.
